articles.title: Repel Demonic Defilement in Splintered Souls — Diablo Immortal — Blizzard News - Blizzard News
articles.description: The twisted Southern Dreadlands beckons for you in the Splintered Souls major update, adventurer. Fight side-by-side with new Familiar companions, explore a new Zone and Zone Event, and more.
articles.content: Welcome to our last major update of 2023, Splintered Souls. This update introduces Familiars to fight alongside you, the Southern Dreadlands Zone and Sentinels Stand Zone Event, 3 new Inferno Difficu… [+43920 chars]
